username.description: Change the current username to a unique namespace matching the format [a-z0-9\-_]+ (required, use original value to prevent updating this field).

display_name.description: Human-readable name to be rendered into UIs and other human-readable locations (required, use original value to prevent updating this field).

email.description: Change to a new valid email address for the user (required, use original value to prevent updating this field).

password.description: Change the password for the user to a string that is over 6 characters

first_name.description: Change the first name of the new user

middle_name.description: Change the middle name of the new user

last_name.description: Change the last name of the new user
